Hello! I am a Ph.D. candidate at the International School of Business & Finance, Sun Yat-sen University, supervised by Prof. Caiping Wang. I am also a visiting Ph.D. student at Nanyang Technological University (Nanyang Business School) in Singapore. Before this, I earned my bachelor's degree from Dongbei University of Finance and Economics.

My current research interests primarily include:

- State-Owned Capital

- Mergers & Acquisitions

- Initial Public Offering

- Securities Regulation
